content: this delicate scarf knits up quickly and uses exactly one ball of fyberspates cumulus you can modify the length of the scarf to use slightly less or more depending upon your preferences it makes a perfect gift a scarf which works with an everyday outfit yet is pretty enough to wear for special occasions make one in your favourite colour or make several this scarf is designed to be a good introduction to working with fine fluffy yarns and lacy stitch patterns more experienced knitters will enjoy having it as an on-the-go project the pattern is both written out and charted **revised pattern uploaded april 8 2014 revised pattern includes new chart and written instructions it also includes optional beading instructions ** please note that the beading instructions in the revised version may not be identical to beading shown in all ravelry projects - please contact the individual raveller for their modifications
